script.line: Spiky Jon! Have you seen a dog around?
A dog? Prota, this is a restaurant.
I know! But Minty's gone missing. Been asking around to see if anyone's spotted her.
Sorry, Prota. Haven't seen Minty at all. But...truth be told, I'm a little distracted today.
Been thinking a lot about my future.
Well, I wish I could help, but--
You want to help?! Prota, you're the best!
Uh...
Okay, first things first. Are you psychic?
Not that I know of...
Hmm. That would have made this a lot easier. But it's okay. Prota, I need you to...
PREDICT MY FUTURE!!
See, I've been having a tough time lately, figuring out what I want to do with my life.
I came here to the Pickle Yard to think, over some unlimited mozzarella sticks.
And that's when I realized: this is what I want to do.
Eat! Professionally! As a Pro Competitive Eater!
I mean, sure, I've got this dopey architecture degree, but...
I think it's time to follow my heart, you know?
Yep! Just like it's time for me to go find Minty.
You get me. Look, I just happen to have these tarot cards with me.
Maybe you could read them for me and offer some guidance on what I should do?
I....yeah. Yeah, sure! I can do that for you, Spiky Jon.
Perfect! I'll draw the first card. That should help me learn about my PAST.
It's THE STAR! Huh. What does that mean?
Hmmm...
